intro.headline: It is strange.
body: But all of these strange and scary things are starting to feel normal. So, here you’ll find the most significant ones.
This is a collection of the historic ways our world is changing, while standing still. Use it to orient yourself, or use it as a record of this unparalleled time.

intro.headline: These are the historic ways
body: our world is changing, while standing still. Read them to acknowledge the surreal happenings in the world right now. And maybe even to get perspective; as we begin to move forward, let’s hope for renewed thinking on what matters.
